import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Modal, Button, Tabs, Tab, Row, Col, Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import Login from './Login' import SignUp from './SignUp' import Logo from '../images/Logo.svg' import LoginModal from "react-login-modal"; function NavBar(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleLoginRender=(isLoggedIn)=>{ if (isLoggedIn){ return ( <> {/* Logout Cart */} ) }else{ return ( <>
Login Signup
) } } return (
Menu Contact & Info {handleLoginRender(props.isLoggedIn)}
) } export default NavBar;
